name: BlastomycosisTestsForBlastomycesSpeciesAntibody
title: Blastomycosis (Tests for Blastomyces species Antibody)
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values contains codes for laboratory test names associated with detecting the presence of blastomyces species antibody.),(Data Element Scope: Laboratory tests names that were ordered or observed.),(Inclusion Criteria: blastomyces antibody),(Exclusion Criteria: panel and interpretation tests)
